name.ja: <ruby>竜<rt>りゅ</rt></ruby><ruby>華<rt>げ</rt></ruby><ruby>界<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>闢<rt>びゃく</rt></ruby>

text.en: Add 1 "Apodrakosis" monster from your Deck to your hand, then you can add 1 "Apodrakosis" Pendulum Monster from your hand to your Extra Deck face-up. During your Main Phase, if you control an "Apodrakosis" Pendulum Monster Card: You can banish this card and 1 "Apodrakosis" monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Apodrakosis" monster from your Deck with the same original Type as the monster banished. You can only use 1 "Apodrakosis World Creation" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
